DialogueDictionary.IkeMonolith1: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Ike is a relatively large, grey object occasionally seen orbiting Duna.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.IkeMonolith2: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Scientists have postulated that Ike is seemingly perfectly positioned to sneakily interfere with any object that presumes to come orbiting near its parent.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.IkeMonolith3: <![CDATA[<color=red>something like theres a pyramid on duna ooooo spooky</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.JoolMonolith1: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Jool is particularly known for being a rather large, predominantly green planet. Kerbalkind has longed to visit it since it was first spotted in the sky.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.JoolMonolith2: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Philosophers reason that the swirling green planet must be a really nice place to visit, on account of its wholesome coloration.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.JoolMonolith3: <![CDATA[<color=lime>If you look at Jool through a telescope, it is fuzzy.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.LaytheMonolith1: <![CDATA[<color=lime>When Laythe was first discovered, it was not entered in the records because the scientist in charge thought he was looking at Kerbin.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.LaytheMonolith2: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Luckily this error was corrected when a plucky intern informed him that “telescopes don’t work that way.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.LaytheMonolith3: <![CDATA[<color=lime>The intern was shortly afterwards “promoted” and moved to the experimental rocket testing program.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.TyloMonolith1: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Tylo was the first moon of Jool to be discovered by the Kerbal Astronomical Society.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.TyloMonolith2: <![CDATA[<color=lime>After many failed attempts to take a flawless picture of Jool to hang on the office walls, it was finally discovered that the wandering white smear was indeed a moon.</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.TyloMonolith3: <![CDATA[<color=lime>Scientists speculate that the view from the surface with Laythe, Vall and Jool overhead must be “quite something”.</color>]]>
